about_the_game:
Big Survivor is a game all about surviving, bigly. More specifically it's a roguelike survivor game, original ik. You might be thinking, "It has to be unique in some aspects right?"... yeah, well, you know... there's some stuff... I drew the enemies myself that's a big one. This description was written by multiple people so prepare for a mood shift.

There are lots of powerups to try out and have fun with, discover what they do and figure out which ones you like the most!

Some of the key features are...
Being able to move
Choose power ups
Levelling
High score comparing
No Menu
Timed gameplay
Bearing no resemblance to Vampire Survivor

I don't know what it will take for this description to get approved, so here's a step by step instruction how to play the game:
1. Open file
2. Press big play button
3. Move with WASD or mouse
4. Manoeuvre around enemies, attacking is automatic
5. Level-up by collecting orbs/killing enemies
6. Choose a good power-up
7. Die -> 2.
8. Press big exit button. You can't get here, I couldn't be bothered making one.

It's a free game, with great replay value so try it out now; It's free so why not?! Did I mention it's free?

Thanks for playing!!

Music by Karl Sandegren

Big Survivor is a game all about surviving, bigly. More specifically it's a roguelike survivor game, original ik. You might be thinking, "It has to be unique in some aspects right?"... yeah, well, you know... there's some stuff... I drew the enemies myself that's a big one. I don't know what it will take for this description to get approved, so here's a step by step instruction how to play the game:
1. Open file
2. Press big play button
3. Move with WASD or mouse
4. Manoeuvre around enemies, attacking is automatic
5. Level-up by collecting orbs/killing enemies
6. Choose a good power-up
7. Die -> 2.
8. Press big exit button. You can't get here, I couldn't be bothered making one.

It's a free game, with great replay value so try it out now; It's free so why not?! Did I mention it's free?

Thanks for playing!!

name: Big Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: above microsoft dos
  • Processor: not that important
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: this one is a dousie
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a very sound card
  • Additional Notes: very light on performance :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“I couldn't stop playing it.”
10/10 – Visual Cordelia
short_description: Survive, with a smile on your face! Fight your way through the scribbles, as you power up and become stronger. Vibe with the tornadoes and get a useless pet. Increase your sucking and suck away!!!!!!?
